name: paloalto-autofocus
label: PaloAlto AutoFocus
description: Palo Alto Networks AutoFocusâ„¢ is a threat intelligence service that provides an interactive, graphical interface for analyzing and contextualizing the threats your network faces.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.description: Specify the URL of the Palo Alto AutoFocus server to connect and perform automated operations.
fields.name: server_url
fields.tooltip: Specify the URL of the Palo Alto AutoFocus server to connect and perform automated operations.

fields.title: API Key
fields.description: Specify the API key to access the endpoint to which you will connect and perform the automated operations
fields.name: api_key
fields.tooltip: Specify the API key to access the endpoint to which you will connect and perform the automated operations

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified. By default, this option is set to True.
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.tooltip: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified. By default, this option is set to True.

operations.title: Get IP Reputation
operations.description: Retrieves a report from Palo Alto AutoFocus for the IP address submitted to determine if it is suspicious based on the IP address you have specified.

parameters.title: IP Address
parameters.description: Specify the IP address for which you want to retrieve a Palo Alto AutoFocus report.
parameters.name: indicatorValue
parameters.tooltip: Specify the IP address for which you want to retrieve a Palo Alto AutoFocus report.

parameters.title: Include Tags
parameters.description: Select the option to include or exclude AutoFocus tags. By default, this is set as True.
parameters.name: includeTags
parameters.tooltip: Select the option to include or exclude AutoFocus tags. By default, this is set as True.

operations.title: Get Domain Reputation
operations.description: Retrieves a report from Palo Alto AutoFocus for the domain submitted to determine if it is suspicious based on the domain name you have specified.

parameters.title: Domain
parameters.description: Specify the domain name for which you want to retrieve a Palo Alto AutoFocus report.
parameters.name: indicatorValue
parameters.tooltip: Specify the domain name for which you want to retrieve a Palo Alto AutoFocus report.

parameters.title: Include Tags
parameters.description: Select the option to include or exclude AutoFocus tags. By default, this is set as True.
parameters.name: includeTags
parameters.tooltip: Select the option to include or exclude AutoFocus tags. By default, this is set as True.

operations.title: Get URL Reputation
operations.description: Retrieves a report from Palo Alto AutoFocus for the URL submitted to determine if it is suspicious based on the URL you have specified.

parameters.title: URL
parameters.description: Specify the URL for which you want to retrieve a Palo Alto AutoFocus report.
parameters.name: indicatorValue
parameters.tooltip: Specify the URL for which you want to retrieve a Palo Alto AutoFocus report.

parameters.title: Include Tags
parameters.description: Select the option to include or exclude AutoFocus tags. By default, this is set as True.
parameters.name: includeTags
parameters.tooltip: Select the option to include or exclude AutoFocus tags. By default, this is set as True.

operations.title: Get File Reputation
operations.description: Retrieves a report from Palo Alto AutoFocus for the file that you have submitted to determine if it is suspicious based on the file hash value you have specified.

parameters.title: File Hash
parameters.description: Specify the File Hash of the file for which you want to retrieve a Palo Alto AutoFocus report.
parameters.name: indicatorValue
parameters.tooltip: Specify the File Hash of the file for which you want to retrieve a Palo Alto AutoFocus report.

parameters.title: Include Tags
parameters.description: Select the option to include or exclude AutoFocus tags. By default, this is set as True.
parameters.name: includeTags
parameters.tooltip: Select the option to include or exclude AutoFocus tags. By default, this is set as True.

operations.title: Get Threat Indicator Feed
operations.description: Retrieves a complete, unsorted list of threat indicators that have been added in the past 24 hours in Palo Alto AutoFocus.

operations.title: Samples Searches
operations.description: Searches for the samples that WildFire has determined are malware.

parameters.title: Scope
parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: Select the scope of the search based on which you want to retrieve list of sample searches from Palo Alto AutoFocus. You can choose from the following options: Private (default), Public, or Global.
parameters.tooltip: Select the scope of the search based on which you want to retrieve list of sample searches from Palo Alto AutoFocus. You can choose from the following options: Private (default), Public, or Global.

parameters.title: Filter Query
parameters.description: Filter the results based on the conditions specified within this object.
parameters.name: query
parameters.tooltip: Filter the results based on the conditions specified within this object.

parameters.title: Operator
parameters.description: If you want more than one search or child search condition, you must specify an additional operator parameter to specify whether to match all or any of the search conditions. Possible values are: All or Any.
parameters.name: operator
parameters.tooltip: If you want more than one search or child search condition, you must specify an additional operator parameter to specify whether to match all or any of the search conditions. Possible values are: All or Any.

parameters.title: Sort By
parameters.description: Select the name of the field based on which you want to sort the result (samples) retrieved by this operation. You can choose from the following values: App Name, App Package Name, FileType, Size, Finish Date, etc.
parameters.name: sort_field
parameters.tooltip: Field to sort by: App Name, App Package Name, FileType, Size, Finish Date, etc.

parameters.title: Sort Order
parameters.description: Select the sorting order of the result. You can choose between Ascending or Descending. Note: Use only when "Sort By" parameter is provided.
parameters.name: sort_order
parameters.tooltip: Direction of sort: Ascending, Descending. Note: Use only when "Sort By" parameter is provided.

parameters.title: Page Size
parameters.description: Specify the maximum count of records that you want this operation to fetch from Palo Alto AutoFocus. By default, this option is set to 50, and you can set a maximum value of 4000.
parameters.name: size
parameters.tooltip: Specify the maximum count of records that you want this operation to fetch from Palo Alto AutoFocus. By default, this option is set as 50 and maximum we can set as 4000.

parameters.title: Page Number
parameters.description: Specify the page from which you want this operation to return results based on the page size. By default, this option is set as '0'. For example, if you set this as '2' and retain the page size as 100, then the operation will return 100 results from the 2nd page.
parameters.name: from
parameters.tooltip: The page to offset from based on the Page Size. By default, this option is set as 0

parameters.title: Type
parameters.description: If you set type to scan, you can get up to 200,000 search results through pagination. Each time you view results, AutoFocus responds with the next page of results until the search is complete. By default, a page displays 50 results, and you can use the "Page Size" parameter to set the number of results on each page. The "Scan" value is currently the only possible value. For type=scan, the "Page Number", "Sort By" and "Sort Order" parameters are not available.
parameters.name: type
parameters.tooltip: If you set type to scan, you can get up to 200,000 search results through pagination. Each time you view results, AutoFocus responds with the next page of results until the search is complete. By default, a page displays 50 results, and you can use the "Page Size" parameter to set the number of results on each page. The "Scan" value is currently the only possible value. For type=scan, the "Page Number", "Sort By" and "Sort Order" parameters are not available.

operations.title: Get Sample Details
operations.description: Retrieves details on a specific samples on the Palo Alto AutoFocus.

parameters.title: Public Tag Name
parameters.description: Specify the name of the public tag for which you want to retrieve details from Palo Alto AutoFocus. Note: The public tag name is visible in the response of "Get Tags List" operation.
parameters.name: public_tag_name
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of the public tag for which you want to retrieve details from Palo Alto AutoFocus. Note: The public tag name is visible in the response of "Get Tags List" operation.

operations.title: Top Tags Search
operations.description: Searches for the Top Tags data available when you view search statistics.

parameters.title: Scope
parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: Select the scope of the search based on which you want to retrieve list of top tags from Palo Alto AutoFocus. You can choose from the following options: All (default), Industry ,Organization, or Global.
parameters.tooltip: Select the scope of the search based on which you want to retrieve list of top tags from Palo Alto AutoFocus. You can choose from the following options: All (default), Industry ,Organization, or Global.

parameters.title: Filter Query
parameters.description: Filter the results based on the conditions specified within this object.
parameters.name: query
parameters.tooltip: Filter the results based on the conditions specified within this object.

parameters.title: Operator
parameters.description: If you want more than one search or child search condition, you must specify an additional operator parameter to specify whether to match all or any of the search conditions. Possible values are: All or Any.
parameters.name: operator
parameters.tooltip: If you want more than one search or child search condition, you must specify an additional operator parameter to specify whether to match all or any of the search conditions. Possible values are: All or Any.

parameters.title: Tag Scopes
parameters.description: Select the one or more tag scopes that you want to filter based on the type of malware. You can choose from the following options: Private (default), Public, Commodity and Unit42.
parameters.name: tagScopes
parameters.tooltip: Select the one or more tag scopes that you want to filter based on the type of malware. You can choose from the following options: Private (default), Public, Commodity and Unit42.

parameters.title: Page Size
parameters.description: Specify the maximum count of records that you want this operation to fetch from Palo Alto AutoFocus. By default, this option is set to 50, and you can set a maximum value of 1000.
parameters.name: size
parameters.tooltip: Specify the maximum count of records that you want this operation to fetch from Palo Alto AutoFocus. By default, this option is set as 50 and maximum we can set as 1000.

operations.title: Get Tags List
operations.description: Retrieves a list of tags from Palo Alto AutoFocus based on the input parameters that you have specified.

parameters.title: Scope
parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: Select the scope of the search based on which you want to retrieve list of tags details from Palo Alto AutoFocus. You can choose from the following options: Visible (default), Private, Mine, Public, Unit42, or Commodity.
parameters.tooltip: Select the scope of the search based on which you want to retrieve list of tags details from Palo Alto AutoFocus. You can choose from the following options: Visible (default), Private, Mine, Public, Unit42, or Commodity.

parameters.title: Filter Query
parameters.description: Filter the results based on the specified tag conditions and values.
parameters.name: query
parameters.tooltip: Filter the results based on the specified tag conditions and values.

parameters.title: Sort By
parameters.description: Select the name of the field based on which you want to sort the result (tags) retrieved by this operation. You can choose from the following values: Name (default), Status, Count, Last Hit, or UpVotes.
parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.tooltip: Field to sort by: Name, Status, Count, Last Hit, UpVotes. By default, this option is set as Name.

parameters.title: Sort Order
parameters.description: Select the sorting order of the result. You can choose between Ascending (default) or Descending.
parameters.name: order
parameters.tooltip: Direction of sort: Ascending, Descending. By default, this option is set as Ascending.

parameters.title: Page Size
parameters.description: Specify the maximum count of records that you want this operation to fetch from Palo Alto AutoFocus. By default, this option is set to 50, and you can set a maximum value of 200.
parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.tooltip: Specify the maximum count of records that you want this operation to fetch from Palo Alto AutoFocus. By default, this option is set as 50 and maximum we can set as 200.

parameters.title: Page Number
parameters.description: Specify the page from which you want this operation to return results based on the page size. By default, this option is set as '0'. For example, if you set this as '2' and retain the page size as 100, then the operation will return 100 results from the 2nd page.
parameters.name: pageNum
parameters.tooltip: The page to offset from based on the Page Size. By default, this option is set as 0

operations.title: Get Tag Details
operations.description: Retrieves details on a specific public tag listed on the Palo Alto AutoFocus.

parameters.title: Public Tag Name
parameters.description: Specify the name of the public tag for which you want to retrieve details from Palo Alto AutoFocus. Note: The public tag name is visible in the response of "Get Tags List" operation.
parameters.name: public_tag_name
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of the public tag for which you want to retrieve details from Palo Alto AutoFocus. Note: The public tag name is visible in the response of "Get Tags List" operation.

operations.title: Get Session Details
operations.description: Retrieves details about a specific session, such as application, filename, source country, and device model from Palo Alto AutoFocus.

parameters.title: Session ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the session for which you want to retrieve details from Palo Alto AutoFocus. Note: The session ID (_id) is visible in the response of "Get Sample Details" operation.
parameters.name: session_id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the session for which you want to retrieve details from Palo Alto AutoFocus. Note: The session ID (_id) is visible in the response of "Get Sample Details" operation.
